wikipedia_page.main:
Helen Jane Ward (née Lander; born 26 April 1986) is an international football striker who is currently playing club football for FA Women's National League South team Watford Ladies and FA Women's Championship side London Bees on a dual registration arrangement. Ward previously spent three seasons with Chelsea Ladies, whom she joined from Arsenal in 2010. Born in the London Borough of Brent, Ward began her career with 14 years at Watford Ladies where she was a prolific goalscorer and team captain.
Ward played for the England women's national under-23 football team in 2007, but chose to represent Wales at senior level in 2008. With over 30 goals, she is the Welsh national team's all–time record goalscorer.
